scripts.e2e: pnpm exec cypress run --project apps/router-demo/router-host-v5-2200 --e2e --config baseUrl=http://127.0.0.1:2000 --browser chrome
scripts.e2e:development: pnpm exec cypress open --project apps/router-demo/router-host-v5-2200 --e2e --config baseUrl=http://127.0.0.1:2000 --browser electron
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm exec concurrently "lsof -i :3005 || pnpm --filter runtime-host run serve" "sleep 4 && pnpm --filter runtime-host run e2e"
